abstract: Richard Cordray, the top cop at the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, plans to crack down on “unfair, deceptive, or abusive acts” by mortgage companies and other lenders.
snippet: Richard Cordray, the top cop at the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, plans to crack down on “unfair, deceptive, or abusive acts” by mortgage companies and other lenders.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has put mortgage companies and other lenders on notice: be on your best behavior.

headline.main: Consumer Watchdog Takes Aim at ‘Abusive’ Lending
